date.dldescription: A date in the format YYYY-MM-DD specifying the date on which the weather was imported.

maxAirTemperature.dldescription: Maximum temperature in degC from 9am local day

minAirTemperature.dldescription: Minimum temperature in DegC to 9am local day

rainfall.dldescription: Total amount of rain in mm from 9am local day

relativeHumidity.dldescription: Relative humidity in percent at 9am local day (%)

windSpeed.dldescription: Mean wind speed in m/s at 10m above ground level over 24 hours from midnight local day

solarRadiation.dldescription: Amount of accumulated global solar radiation in MJ/m2 (Mega Joules per square metre) from midnight local day

barometricPressure.dldescription: Vapour pressure in hPa at 9am local day in hPa

potentialEvapotranspiration.dldescription: 24 hour Penman Potential Evapotranspiration total in mm from 9am local day. (mm /day)
